summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, to an unspecified recipient named Lisa. The email discusses a follow-up regarding AcATs that were expected to be returned from JPHorgan, indicating a potential financial transaction or inquiry.
